price: 86. Nabii Yaq-qhuub keenil gacisak : yi kaxxa hammii kee rookak Yallak sa numul ma weqsita anu Yallih nacrooruk isin aaxige waytaanam aaxige keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
